title: Coronavirus Updates - Pfizer Fiasco, Public Shaming in South Africa & Santa's Immunity
itunes:title: Coronavirus Updates - Pfizer Fiasco, Public Shaming in South Africa & Santa's Immunity
description:
The Trump administration rejected an opportunity to buy more vaccine doses from Pfizer, South African police shame maskless citizens, and the WHO declares Santa Claus immune from COVID-19.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
